OOC: 
Panzer is a black panther maximal.  She stands 5 foot tall in bot 
form and has a black panther maximal form.  She's a scout and a recon 
soldier. Currently, she's just landed and I can't think of where to 
place her since I heard that the planet was reformated and I  have no 
clue as to where the continents are or any of the bases.  So, I will 
need some help as far as getting her to a maximal base at this point. 

Panzer fell down somewhere in a mountain range in Europe somewhere. I 
know it's vague, but it's the best I can do untill I get the rest 
figured out.  BTW, I'll just stick with two chars for a while. I 
don't think I can handle much more than that right now. Thanx.

Logo.
